attributes.action: offer students discounts on daily oyster travel on the tube and buses - not just on season tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students should pay less on the daily fares using oyster cards on the tube and the bus - it is unfair that student discount is only offered on weekly and longer passes. For example, a journey within zone 1 using oyster costs £1.50. For students this should be, say, only £1. The scheme should extend over all zones.
